text: Bioty Moise Kean (; born 28 February 2000) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Juventus, on loan from Everton, and the Italy national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Juventus 2016–17 Serie A 3 1 0 0 — 1 0 0 0 4 1 2018–19 Serie A 13 6 1 1 — 3 0 0 0 17 7 Total 16 7 1 1 — 4 0 0 0 21 8 Hellas Verona (loan) 2017–18 Serie A 19 4 1 0 — — — 20 4 Everton 2019–20 Premier League 29 2 1 0 3 0 — — 33 2 2020–21 Premier League 2 0 0 0 2 2 — — 4 2 2021–22 Premier League 1 0 0 0 1 0 — — 2 0 Total 32 2 1 0 6 2 — — 39 4 Paris Saint-Germain (loan) 2020–21 Ligue 1 26 13 5 1 — 9 3 1 0 41 17 Juventus 2021–22 Serie A 32 5 3 0 — 6 1 1 0 42 6 2022–23 Serie A 28 6 2 1 — 10 1 — 40 8 2023–24 Serie A 17 0 1 0 — — — 18 0 Total 77 11 6 1 — 16 2 1 0 100 14 Career total 170 37 14 3 6 2 29 5 2 0 221 47 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Italy 2018 1 0 2019 2 2 2020 5 0 2021 4 2 2022 0 0 2023 3 0 Total 15 4 :Italy score listed first, score column indicates score after each Kean goal.
